content: धी {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (धीयते) {@--1@} To disregard, disrespect. {@--2@} To propitiate. {@--3@} To hold, contain. {@--4@} To accomplish, fulfil.

धीः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [ध्यै भावे क्विप् संप्रसारणं च] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Intellect, understanding; धियः समग्रैः स गुणैरुदारधीः <ls>R. 3. 30</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> कुधी, सुधी &c. ({%b%}) Mind; दुष्टधी wicked-minded; <ls>Bg. 2. 54</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 30.</ls> {@--2@} Idea, imagination, fancy, conception; न धियां पथि वर्तसे <ls>Ku. 6. 22</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 136.</ls> {@--3@} A thought, intention, purpose, propensity; <ls>Ki. 1. 37.</ls> {@--4@} Devotion, prayer. {@--5@} A sacrifice. {@--6@} Knowledge, science.
